page.title: 18ALICE GREGORY'S DAY IN BRILL
page.content: I get up at 7.30am..I have breakfast which is a bowl of Countrystore or Corn -flakes.Then I wash my teeth.I wash my face.We do not have a school uniform so I wear skirt,jumper and T-shirt.I walk to school with several of my friends.It takes 10 minutes.At school we play all sorts of games such as elastic and chase.At 9am.school begins.There are 31 children in our class.Mr.Harrison is our teacher.At 10.30am.we go out to play for 15 minutes.At 12 noon we have lunch.A typical lunch is fish in batter,baked beans and chips and fruit fruit jelly.We play Chinese cricket on on a Wednesday.At 1pm.school starts.At 2.30pm.we go out to play for 15 minutes.We go home at 3.30pm..We are taught maths,English grammar,history, geography and science etc..I do various evening activities such as Brownies,riding and piano lessons.
